ai-vv7:1.2_0: stand at the foot of a tree.
ai-vv7:3.1_0: I ask you, Queen, the mightycle of the great power,
ai-vv7:3.3_0: Whose mind is not developed like this?
ai-vv7:4.3_0: asked a question, and he answered the questions.
ai-vv7:4.4_0: It is the fruit of that deed,
ai-vv7:5.3_0: Having seen that mendicant, full of defilements,
ai-vv7:6.3_0: for him are cool, there is no coming to an end.
ai-vv7:7.1_0: that number of waters all were united.
ai-vv7:7.3_0: Mango, sal, plum, and jambolan trees,
ai-vv7:8.1_0: That portion of the land is well-endowed,
ai-vv7:8.3_0: this is the result of good deeds,
ai-vv7:10.1_0: I am a mendicant with great power,
